_meta.description: Promoting an authentic and responsible contact with the territory, in the spirit of relaxation and well-being. Discover the mission of Friland.
_meta.title: Why Friland? Our story and our goal

1.title: Energy saving* for heating and lighting.

2.title: Water saving* for sanitary and kitchen use.

3.title: Green energy produced by solar panels.

4.title: Wood. The material our rooms are made of.

5.title: We use only local and regional products.

features.subtitle: Our impact
features.tip: Data referring to the average daily consumption of an overnight stay in a hotel (source: Assoturismo)
features.title: We are committed to having a <important>positive impact</important>.

item1.content: Our rooms are off-grid,meaning they do not depend on the water or sewerage network, so we do not leave an environmental print. This allows us to respect the surrounding environment, avoiding the consumption of resources and keeping the impact on the territory low.
item1.title: Zero land consumption

item2.content: In our rooms, electricity is provided by solar panels, ensuring sustainable energy to cover the needs of our guests. As for the water system, we use an internal cistern system. We are committed to installing energy-efficient devices that meet all of our customers' needs, while maintaining a small ecological impact.
item2.title: Renewable energy

item3.content: In our rooms, we encourage responsible and careful use of resources. To this end, we have installed a display that gives our guests a snapshot of their impact on the environment in real time. This tool provides information on water consumption, electricity consumption and photovoltaic production, allowing guests to carefully monitor their energy consumption.
item3.title: Consumption monitoring

ourCommitment.subtitle: Our commitment
ourCommitment.title: We promote a <important>culture</important> of respect and awareness.

item1.content: Friland was created to promote a new and responsible contact with the territory through a unique opportunity: living in ymbiosis with nature. With Friland we want to promote a temporary lifestyle. Our project embodies the idea of reversibility and allows people an authentic immersion into nature, offering an alternative to land consumption. The land is not a human 'right' , but a privilege to be respected.
item1.title: How the project was born

item2.content: Friland accommodations are designed to have a minimal impact on the environment without sacrificing comfort. They are equipped with a comfortable bed, a perfectly equipped kitchen and a minimal but comfortable bathroom. The rooms have IoT technology: we constantly receive data on water consumption and energy production from photovoltaic panels to guarantee an optimal experience for guests, optimizing available resources.
item2.title: The room

item3.content: Friland has the precious help of expert and trained partners, who help the project by managing the rooms to offer you the best possible service
item3.title: Our Partners

item4.content: The Friland Team is made up of young people full of desire to grow and improve. All from different backgrounds, the team members complement and help each other in the daily management of work, in a climate of sharing and well-being. We all have the same goal: to make Friland live and grow
item4.title: The team

item1.content:
Friland is <important>passion for our territory</important>, the one we
live in but often don't know.

item2.content:
Friland is an <important>immersion into Nature</important> to find the
right <important>time</important> and space, while <important>respecting</important> the
environment, reconciling your mind to your
body and regenerating your spirit.

item3.content:
We promote a culture of slow travel that
leaves no trace, because we are convinced
that a <important>reversible</important> way of experiencing the
territory is possible.
We want to be the bearers of authentic and <important>conscious experiences</important>, which amplify the
senses and generate <important>well-being</important>.
We want to give back meaning to the words
silence, rain, night.

item4.content:
Friland is an opportunity to disconnect from
the frenzy of everyday life and reconnect with
ourselves and nature.
It is a room, nomadic, ecological, self-sufficient
and out of the ordinary, to rediscover true,
unique emotions that we often forget.

NatureRetreat.text_one: Discover the world of Friland, where nature and comfort meet to give you a special stay. Our tiny houses, located in spectacular natural environments, will allow you to immerse yourself in breathtaking landscapes and enjoy moments of pure relaxation, away from stress and the daily routine.
NatureRetreat.text_two: It doesn't matter if you are an adventure enthusiast looking for itineraries and paths in the countryside, or if you are simply looking for a refuge to relax in a quiet environment and away from daily stress. With a Friland Nature Room you can have it all: adventure and discovery at your fingertips, as well as the peace and comfort of a retreat tailor-made for you.

_meta.description: An immersion in nature is the natural antidote to work stress. Discover Friland's Smart Working and digital detox solutions for companies and businesses.
_meta.title: Smart Working in nature: Friland services for companies

cta2Box.label: Tell me more
cta2Box.text: Activities and tools for internal exploration (for the individual and/or the work team) and external exploration (the territory as a canvas on which to build and enhance oneself).
cta2Box.title: An experience of personal, corporate, and territorial <important>growth</important>

ctaBox.label: Tell me more
ctaBox.text: Allowing your employees to spend a few days immersed in nature means enabling them to work with greater concentration, enhancing creativity, and improving overall mental and physical well-being. But a Friland experience is much more than this.
ctaBox.title: <important>Much more</important> than just smart working

1.text: Disconnect to reconnect. A Friland experience accompanied by a booklet tailored for personal or corporate use, containing stimuli, exercises, inspirations, and ideas. An ideal platform composed of elements such as: nature, privacy, tranquility, time, and space to focus.
1.title: <important>Booklet</important> Friland

2.text: A unique place to work in peace and without distractions. Discover the benefits nature can bring to work; in Friland, you'll find your time and space.
2.title: <important>Smart</important> Working

3.text: Reward an employee with a nature getaway, a unique experience to recharge.
3.title: <important>Corporate</important> Benefit

imgBoxes.text: The Friland <important>experiential</important> format for your employees
imgBoxes.title: A unique stay

features.features_list_notes: Each room is equipped with a large and comfortable double bed that can accommodate a maximum of two adults and one child under 10 years old. Animals, if admitted in this destination, are welcome but cannot climb onto the bed. The cost of the room is fixed, it does not vary with the increasing number of guests.

_meta.description: Discover the benefits of becoming a Friland partner. Share our values of sustainability and promote responsible tourism in your area.
_meta.title: Become a Friland partner: discover benefits and opportunities

accessibility.text: It is important, therefore, that the location is accessible on foot from the parking area.
accessibility.title: Accessibility

landscape.text: It doesn't matter if your land faces the mountains, sea, or lake; what matters is that its beauty leaves an impression.
landscape.title: Panoramic views

nature.text: We look for areas that are immersed in nature and show minimal signs of human presence.
nature.title: Nature

quiteness.text: An immersion in nature is genuine only if tranquility and silence are guaranteed.
quiteness.title: Tranquility

additional_income.text: We offer our partners an income for the use of their land for the entire duration of our stay.
additional_income.title: An additional income

flexibility.text: The Friland rooms are mobile and off-grid. Should needs change, no trace of Friland will be left behind.
flexibility.title: Flexibility

promoting_your_service.text: The Friland community is very active and attentive to all local offerings, from typical products to excursions or experiences in the area.
promoting_your_service.title: We promote your services

value_partner.text: Entering the Friland network means sharing its values and mission: respecting nature and its resources.
value_partner.title: A value partner

step1.text: We provide you with one of our rooms and take care of the setup.

step2.text: We handle all the paperwork, bookings, and guest stays. You don't need to be present at check-in or check-out.

step3.text: We remotely monitor all the room's resources. We provide you with training for simple periodic maintenance tasks. We have developed a proprietary app to support this.

box1.title: Visit us at our offices at Via Taboga 307, 33013 Gemona del Friuli, Udine.

box2.text: Start a chat with one of our operators by pressing the appropriate button at the bottom right, or select one of the following options:
box2.title: Do you need any more information?

Partners.text: Hosting a Friland accommodation means sharing a vision of tourism that respects people and the environment to offer the beauty and peculiarities of its territory
Partners.title: Be our <important>partner</important>
